$PQEFF the poison pill is to buy a target company some time to hunt for an alternative to a hostile offer. Hostile bidders almost always convince security commission hearing panels to “cease trade” or shut down their poison pills. Trading has already been ceased on the Canadian Exchange as we all know how would a poison pill be instituted trading if trading has been halted? Anybody in this chat from Canada understand why the exchange or the government is not protecting his company ... maybe they will in the future?
